name: awac-claude-code-plugins
description: Custom plugins for Claude Code by Ivan Lutsenko

plugins.name: glm-toggle
plugins.description: Toggle between GLM API and standard Anthropic API

plugins.name: bereke-business-test-gen
plugins.description: Automated unit test generation for Kotlin/Android business logic with corporate standards

plugins.name: crashlytics
plugins.description: Multi-platform crash analysis for Android & iOS with git blame forensics and code-level fixes. Supports Swift, Kotlin, Java, Objective-C.

plugins.name: obsidian-tracker
plugins.description: Project tracking and bug logging with Obsidian integration
